name: Canniblock
description:
Here is a little breakout type of game made in Python using pygame zero. I created it during a training of game developpement. I coded it all and I created all the assets. To launch the game you have to write: pgzrun Canniblock.py in the terminal of the Python file. 

You have to survive with your 3 lives. You also can take the power-up that falls. Good luck!

Look at the code here : http://github.com/Miaouch/canniblock
